name: Last defense (itch) (Doctored studios)
description:
Use the mouse to move the ship. collide with enemies to destroy and score. 

protect the red ship that's out of gas. 

You get five lives.

There are cheat codes to this game. 

Click on the text box and type in "atari2600",  press enter, and click play.  This will unlock the bomb. 

To use the bomb, click as you drag the ship around the screen.

The second cheat gives you 10 extra lives.

Click on the text box and type in "coralreef",  press enter, and click play.  

Credits: 

Space background: https://bacteri.itch.io/background-space

space assets: https://www.kenney.nl/assets/space-shooter-redux

music was: https://melobytes.com/en/app/ai_image2sound
